- `vmNetworkCIDR` (string) - CIDR for VM network.
  Default 10.0.2.0/24 if not specified.

- `vmIPv6NetworkCIDR` (string) - IPv6 CIDR for the VM network.
  Defaults to fd10:0:2::/120 if not specified.
